original_text: And David came to his house at Jerusalem; and the king took the ten women his concubines, whom he had left to keep the house, and put them in ward, and fed them, but went not in unto them. So they were shut up unto the day of their death, living in widowhood.
korean_text: 다윗이 예루살렘 본궁에 이르러 전에 머물러 왕궁을 지키게 한 후궁 열 명을 잡아 별실에 가두고 먹을 것만 주고 그들에게 관계하지 아니하니 그들이 죽는 날까지 갇혀서 생과부로 지내니라

sentences.original_text: And David came to his house at Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다윗이 예루살렘에 있는 자기 집으로 돌아왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and the king took the ten women his concubines
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 열 명의 그의 후궁들을 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: whom he had left to keep the house
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 집을 지키도록 남겨두었던 사람들이었습니다

sentences.original_text: but went not in unto them
unto the day of their death
